components.name: help.trello.com
components.description: Trello's Help docs system, serving docs at help.trello.com

components.name: Atlassian Support - Support Portal
components.description: Support portal contact forms allow customers to raise support issues. Delays here might mean there's an issue with submitting a support request.

components.name: Atlassian Support Ticketing
components.description: Trello Support tickets can be replied to via email or from the ticket view on getsupport.atlassian.com. If there's an outage, you may be unable to view support tickets from getsupport.atlassian.com temporarily, but customers can reply to existing tickets by email.

incident_updates.body: Atlassian email notifications are being delivered as our email delivery vendor is processing the backlog of queued mail messages. This may take some time to complete. We are continuing to monitor the situation and will provide an update once all queued messages have been delivered.

We continue to work on resolving the delayed email notifications issue for Confluence, Jira Work Management, Jira Service Management, Jira Software, Trello, and Atlassian Bitbucket. 

Our email delivery vendor has identified the root cause and is accelerating the delivery of queued mail messages. Atlassian email notifications will be delivered once these queued messages have all been processed. Atlassian is continuing to monitor the situation and will provide an update once all queued messages have been delivered.

We continue to work on resolving the delayed email notifications issue for Confluence, Jira Work Management, Jira Service Management, Jira Software, Trello, and Atlassian Bitbucket. Our email delivery vendor is making progress identifying the root cause, and recovery has started with email delivery resuming for queued messages. Email notifications will be delivered once the incident has been fully resolved.

We have identified an incident which has resulted in delayed email notifications for Confluence, Jira Work Management, Jira Service Management, Jira Software, Trello, and Atlassian Bitbucket Cloud customers. Email notifications will be delivered once the incident has been resolved. We are continuing to investigate and will provide more details once they become available.

We have identified an incident which has resulted in delayed email notifications for Confluence, Jira Work Management, Jira Software, Trello, and Atlassian Bitbucket Cloud customers. Email notifications will be delivered once the incident has been resolved. More details will be provided as they become available.
